For people who are diagnosed and treated early, a normal lifespan is possible. If left untreated, hemochromatosis can lead to severe organ damage and even death.",NHLBI,Hemochromatosis
What causes Hemochromatosis ?,"The two types of hemochromatosis are primary and secondary. Each type has a different cause.
